NetworkedActionsPrompt.Objective: Generate an XML representation for networked actions based on the user-provided specifications.
NetworkedActionsPrompt.SystemMessage: This prompt guides the creation of XML structures for actions that are interconnected, with dependencies and conditions affecting their execution.

Step.Action: List actions and their dependencies or conditions.
Step.OutputFormat: <NetworkedActions> <Action name="Action1" dependsOn="Action2" condition="Condition1" /> <Action name="Action2" /> <!-- Add more actions as needed --> </NetworkedActions>

NetworkedActionsPrompt.Outcome: An XML structure representing interconnected actions with dependencies and conditions.
NetworkedActionsPrompt.ExampleOutput: <NetworkedActions> <Action name="AnalyzeData" dependsOn="FetchData" condition="DataAvailable" /> <Action name="FetchData" /> <Action name="ReportResults" dependsOn="AnalyzeData" condition="AnalysisComplete" /> </NetworkedActions>
